name: Skuishy souls
description:
Skuishi Souls  

Group 2 

Theme: SFX, Swords

Category: 3D platform, Bullet Hell

Developed in Unreal Engine for Jam 2022 Club de los Videojuegos UM

The player encounters a 3D platformer bullet hell where the main character "Skuishi" must go through the levels dodging swords through different timelines, as the player progresses in the game the swords that attack him change times until manages to reach the end of the level and beat the game, the player loses if he is hit by a sword and he wins if he completes the level correctly.

Thaks for play...

Enjoy the game
